comment: The <line> element is an SVG basic shape used to create a line connecting two points.

attributes.name: x1
attributes.comment: x position of the line starting point.

attributes.name: y1
attributes.comment: y position of the line starting point.

attributes.name: x2
attributes.comment: x position of the line ending point.

attributes.name: y2
attributes.comment: y position of the line ending point.

attributes.name: pathLength
attributes.comment: the total length for the circle's circumference, in user units.
